title: Men's Classic White T-Shirt
about_category: Dress up your everyday look with our men's denim shirts that are built to last. The relaxed fit can be worn to match your mood and plans – whether it’s a casual hangout or a dinner date, be stylish, be different, be bold. Pick our denim shirts and you’re ready to stand out from the crowd. Let Manfare be Your Everyday Style Statement.

product_specification.3: Fabrics: Breathable export quality denim fabric for maximum comfort.
product_specification.4: Full sleeves with buttoned cuffs for versatility.
product_specification.5: Slightly curved hem that strengthens the shirts.
product_specification.6: Relaxed fit for utmost comfort that compliments your style.
product_specification.7: Quality Control: To identify if each Shirt is up to the Highest Quality Standard.

care_instructions.7: Do Not Iron Over The Label

about_brand: Manfare has become locally renowned for the classy collection of men’s everyday wear. The premium design and comfort of our shirts will become your best daily companion. As a lifestyle brand MANFARE aims to serve the customers with the quality one deserves. Since 2017, Manfare has been serving the fashion industry with pride and mastered the art of making men’s wardrobe a reflection of their personality. Define your Everyday Style Statement! Welcome to the world of Manfare Clothing!
